meanings.definition: A rare mineral with the chemical formula Na7Ca(Fe,Mn)4Al2Si8O24(SO4)Cl(OH)·H2O. It is a member of the zeolitic mineral group.
meanings.english_definition: A rare mineral with the chemical formula Na7Ca(Fe,Mn)4Al2Si8O24(SO4)Cl(OH)·H2O. It is a member of the zeolitic mineral group.

examples.sentence: The Murasakite crystal was found in the mine.
examples.translation: その紫金石の結晶は鉱山で発見された。

etymology.value: Named after the Murasaki Shikibu, the author of The Tale of Genji.
